divs: Sighting DetailsI was in my front yard and my son and I was trying out are new million candle lite from home depot. We watched the beem go way up in the sky. I aimed at a jet liner that was about 40,000 ft high by acendent. and stoped after a few sec. I turned around and started to walk inside the house when I turned to the right and saw a light come down and hover about a half mile out and no sound. I was stoped in my tracks and felt like I was being watched. a few sec. and it disapaired as fast as it appared. I say your net site and finialy feel not afried to tell anyone that I didnt know well. I know how and why things fly so fast and feel that the usa I behind alot of these sitings. I felt good that I was checked out I feel the us sould be aware . Thanks Ralph Porro
Summary: I saw a lite in the sky that seemed to watch us. It cam and went and no sound
